overview:
Jeremy Hanks is a 3 time technology entrepreneur.

He is the Cofounder & CEO of DropShip.com, a provider of private drop shipping software platforms for the retail supply chain. He is also Founder of E-DSS.org, the open eCommerce Drop Shipping Standard.

Previously, he founded and Doba, an eCommerce drop shipping virtual distributor. During his leadership, Doba grew over 3,000% in 4 yrs, was ranked #23 on the Inc. 500, and #1 on the MWCN Utah 100 as the fastest growing company in Utah, and was a finalist in the 2008 Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year award. Previously, he founded and sold GearTrade.com, an online marketplace for used and distressed inventory.

Jeremy serves as a Trustee for the Utah Technology Council and as a Founder and Advisory Board member of the BYU Rollins Center for Technology and Entrepreneurship, where he holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Business Management. He also founded LaunchUp.org, a Utah based non-profit and community resource for first-time entrepreneurs.
